snippet: After stricter crash-testing, the state of Virginia will remove some ET-Plus guardrails, as well as some others, on its roads.
abstract: Virginia will start replacing some roadside guardrails, including some made by Trinity Industries, no later than fall 2016.
lead_paragraph: After stricter crash-testing, the state of Virginia will remove some ET-Plus guardrails, as well as some others, on its roads.

headline.main: Virginia to Replace Guardrails With Others Deemed Safer
headline.print_headline: Virginia to Replace Guardrails With Others Deemed Safer Beginning Next Year
